channel.title: This discord has ghosts in it (One-Shot in March)
channel.description:
the discord is split up into rooms of a **haunted house**. **ghosts** haunt rooms and type their horror into them. **investigators** explore each room all while narrating the horror to all players. ghosts will reveal parts of themselves by creating new rooms, inspiring horror, and making the house a labyrinth.
![image|690x448](upload://3pB3IEolOCePc1XBKU1sygKX5jO.jpeg)
*Note: I'll be adding some additional rules to help with structure (e.g. some time and space for each group to coordinate backstories etc. before play starts) & safety (e.g. explicit discussion on tone, check-in at halfway break)*
**CW** : Haunted House, Death, Grief **Duration** : A single 3 hour session **Breaks** : A 10 minute break halfway through **Venue** : Discord text/voice **Recording** : No **Attendance** : One-Shot. **Safety** : Lines & Veils, X-Card, and Open Door policy. Tools can be changed to suit the players. This game will follow the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct.
[One-Shot](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MSm-t_NRzUSZ_r8hGA1): [date=2021-03-27 time=21:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2021-03-27 time=23:59:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"]
RSVPs open to all on 8th February at 1pm.
